name: HD Skin Cream Contour and Highlight Sculpting Palette
about: What it is:An easy-to-use cream face palette with all you need to conceal, contour, highlight, and underpaint like a pro for a flawlessly sculpted look...What Else You Need to Know:The palette has six shades to conceal or even out skin tone: two contour shades and four highlighters. The lightweight, comfortable formula syncs with skin for a naturally radiant finish that lasts for 12 hours, while the buildable coverage makes it ideal for all skill levels and looks..This Set Contains:

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Conceal or even skin tone:.-Find and mix shades that most closely match your skin tone..-Next, layer on your customized concealer shade (lighter than your skin tone) using your ring finger or small brush to gently tap over any areas of concern. .Pro tip: .-Swatch shades along your jawline and blend towards the neck to find your best match.  ..Contour and highlight:.-Determine your face shape and what effect you want to create. .-Select a sculpting shade darker than your skin tone and apply to desired areas to create depth, blending upwards for the most natural effect..-Apply highlighter on the areas you want to illuminate, such as the upper part of the cheekbones, bridge of the nose, chin, and Cupid's bow...Pro tip: .-Mix the two sculpting shades until you achieve a hue that is complementary to your skinu2019s undertone, but a few shades deeper than your base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m typically reserved when it comes to praising my purchases, but I must admit, this makeup palette truly surpassed my expectations. At 46, heavy, full-coverage makeup just doesnu2019t suit my skin anymore. Iu2019ve been on the hunt for a product that offers a radiant finish and effortless contouring, and Iu2019ve finally found it. So much so, that I seized the opportunity of the Sephora sale to purchase another. Though Iu2019ve eyed the Saint palette makeup, its price was a bit steep for my budget. This palette is the solution Iu2019ve been searching for. For those considering an upgrade, I also recommend the HD Skin Face Essential - Corrected: Long-wear Full Face Cream Palette in Light to Medium. Itu2019s a worthy addition if you can spare the expense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I immediately fell in love with this palette - I love that it's multi-use for my makeup routine as I even use it for eyeshadow. I found it was creamy enough that I could really blend it out and get some good coverage, so no need for additional foundation most days!  Having said that, there were certain colours I gravitated towards far more than others, and so one month in I'm already half-way through some shades while others will never be touched (just far too dark and warm-toned for me). I'd love the ability to refill my faves and maybe swap out the colours I don't use with others - maybe even a blush to make this a truly one-stop shop?!   Without the ability to refill I likely won't repurchase simply because it's far too expensive to only use half the palette, and/or have to get a whole new one every couple months just for the sake of a couple shades. No palette can be universal, so it needs to be customizable.

reviews.review_title: High quality, a bit warm in tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, this one kind of took me a while to figure out. I think that the more experienced you are with makeup, the more this palette will likely make sense to you.  This palette utilizes color, shadow, and an intriguing additional variable: shimmery highlighter. As such, you can use the shades to mimic light and depth on the face. For example, if you've ever applied a full coverage foundation, then you know that immediately afterwards, your face looks one-dimensional. The intent with this palette is to offer an all-in-one that gives dimension.  An easy way for beginners to approach this is: focus the light on the center of your face, and add depth where you contour as well as the perimeter of your face. You can also try looking at how outdoor light hits your face and mimic that with this palette.  Ok now for palette performance! This palette does feel high quality through and through. It's made of a sturdy tin material and the shades do melt into each other (exactly as you'd hope!) As a cream palette, it's not the most longwearing, but it's a good in-between of the performance of cream and liquid base products. I very much appreciate the skin-like finish!  You may need a selection of smaller brushes to work with these pans. You'll struggle to get a big ol' blending brush in to pick up the shades. I suspect you could also use your fingers if you wanted to.  Finally, the one note I have with this palette is that I am unsure it is truly universal. I think it would have been wise of MUFE to offer a lighter and deeper palette option, especially as this seems to specifically leave out cooler deep tones. That said, they do have a cream foundation palette that seems to fully cover all shades and undertones. IMO, if you have a cooler, deeper skin tone, you may want to compare this to that palette before purchasing.  Palette received complimentary from Makeup Forever; all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_text: Love! This palette is so handy and cute - it's small enough for travel but still has everything you need, and the packaging feels sturdy with some weight to it. The colors are creamy and easily blendable, with a surprising amount of color payoff while still being natural and easy to blend. You could definitely layer a powder or a more dramatic highlighter over top as needed for more going-out looks, but I love this for giving some life to my face for easy makeup days. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Makeup Forever HD Skin Sculpting Palette is a game-changer when it comes to sculpting and defining your features. This palette is truly amazing, with a formula that is second to none. It's a versatile palette that is perfect for anyone who wants to achieve a flawless, sculpted look. One of the most impressive things about this palette is how well it blends into the skin. The formula is incredibly smooth and lightweight, and it blends seamlessly into the skin for a natural-looking finish. This makes it easy to achieve a flawless, sculpted look without any harsh lines or obvious contouring. The shades in the Makeup Forever HD Skin Sculpting Palette are also very versatile. With three different shades, you can use them to conceal, contour, and bronze your skin. This makes it the perfect palette to take with you on-the-go or to use as your go-to palette for everyday makeup looks. Overall, the Makeup Forever HD Skin Sculpting Palette is a must-have for anyone who wants to achieve a flawless, sculpted look. The formula is amazing, and the shades are versatile enough to use for concealing, contouring, and bronzing. If you're looking for a new sculpting palette, this one is definitely worth trying out! This was gifted by Makeup Forever
